package.name: Mail_Mime
package.summary: Provides classes to create and decode mime messages.
package.description: Provides classes to deal with creation and manipulation of mime messages: o mime.php: Create mime email, with html, attachments, embedded images etc. o mimePart.php: Advanced method of creating mime messages. o mimeDecode.php - Decodes mime messages to a usable structure. o xmail.dtd: An XML DTD to acompany the getXML() method of the decoding class. o xmail.xsl: An XSLT stylesheet to transform the output of the getXML() method back to an email

release.notes: o License change o Applied a few changes From Ilia Alshanetsky
o Added header encoding o Altered mimePart to put boundary parameter on newline o Changed addFrom() to setFrom() o Added setSubject() o Made mimePart inherit crlf setting from mime
This is a maintenance release with various bugfixes and minor enhancements.
This is the initial release of the Mime_Mail package.
